ingredients: 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup margarine, softened, 2  eggs, 1   +   1/2 cups mashed banana, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 25mg 8%, Sodium 175mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 2mg 10%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 111mg 2%
